edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.util.crypto

Class PEMFormatUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uiuc.ncsa.security.util.crypto.PEMFormatUtil

  • public class PEMFormatUtil
extends Object
    This does the grunt work of formatting keys and cert requests.

    Created by Jeff Gaynor
    on Jun 7, 2011 at 11:37:35 AM

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PEMFormatUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String bytesToChunkedString(byte[] body)
      Fixes OAUTH-212: upgrade to version 1.10 of apache commons no longer chunks strings, so PEM format of all keys and certs are no longer readable by Open SSL, e.g.
      static String delimitBody(byte[] body, String head, String tail)
      Roughly the inverse of (@link getBodyBytes(String, String, String), This will take any array of bytes, base 64 encode it and slap the head and tail around it.
      static void delimitBody(byte[] body, String head, String tail, OutputStream outputStream)
      Same as delimitBody(byte[], String, String), but send the result to the stream.
      static String delimitBody(String body, String head, String tail)
      Utility to delimit a string (usually base 4 encoded DER byte array) with specific head and tail.
      static void delimitBody(String body, String head, String tail, OutputStream outputStream)
      Same as delimitBody(String, String, String) but send output to a stream.
      protected static void delimitBody(String body, String head, String tail, PrintWriter pw)
      Same as delimitBody(String, String, String) but send the result to a PrintWriter.
      static void delimitBody(String body, String head, String tail, Writer writer)
      Same as delimitBody(String, String, String) but send output to a writer
      static String getBody(String pem, String head, String tail)
      Strip off the head and tail of a PEM encoded string.
      static byte[] getBodyBytes(String pem, String head, String tail)
      Gets the body bytes, i.e., what is between the head and tail (which you must supply) of the pem.
      static String readerToString(Reader f)
      Take a reader and stick its contents into a string.

      • delimitBody

        public static String delimitBody(String body,
                                 String head,
                                 String tail)
        Utility to delimit a string (usually base 4 encoded DER byte array) with specific head and tail. This checks that there are not extra carriage returns (which would invalidate the output).
        Parameters:
        body -
        head -
        tail -
        Returns:
